init.title: Configure Entity Subscription
init.description:
Select Home Assistant entities to push to **{device_name}**.

The selected entities' states will be sent to your Arduino device in real-time, allowing your device to display or use these values.

ble_entities.title: Configure BLE Entity Subscription
ble_entities.description:
Select Home Assistant entities to push to **{device_name}** via Bluetooth.

⚠️ **Note:** BLE has limited bandwidth. Maximum **{max_entities}** entities can be subscribed.

The entities will be assigned indices 0, 1, 2... in the order you select them. Make sure your Arduino code subscribes to the same indices.

abort.ble_not_supported: BLE devices do not support entity subscription. This feature is only available for WiFi devices.
abort.ble_control_not_supported: This BLE device does not support bidirectional communication. Entity subscription requires a device with GATT control service enabled.
